info.title: Clavel API
info.description:
Clavel OpenApi description.  Developed by Aduxia
[http://www.aduxia.com](http://www.aduxia.com) based on
[http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io).

get.summary: Retrieve if the user needs to reset his password
get.description: Retrieve if the user needs to reset his password

post.description: The user can change his password.

204.description:
Empty response. The request does not update the token,
     *          it just verifies if the token is valid.

password.description: User's password to confirm his identity

post.description:
Using the user's email, the system will send an email with a 5 digit
     *              code to reset the password.

Date.description:
The Date in ISO 8601 format.
YYYY-MM-DD

Time.description:
The Time in ISO 8601 format.
<user's local time><time representation of the user's timezone>
hh:mm:sshh:mm:ss

DateTime.description:
The DateTime in ISO 8601 format.
<YYYY-MM-DD>T<user's local time><time representation of the user's timezone>
YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:sshh:mm:ss

UnprocessableEntity.description: Input data is not valid. We will define a more appropiate schema model

example.message: Input data is not valid. We will define a more appropiate schema model
